players

Class PlayerData

  • java.lang.Object
    • players.PlayerData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HitterData, PitcherData

    public class PlayerData
extends java.lang.Object
    PlayerData is the representation of player data common to both pitchers and position players in MLB Showdown. Instances of PlayerData are not intended to be created, within the scope of MLB Showdown, it simply provides a baseline set of methods usefull for both HitterData and PitcherData, which are the actual classes that should be used for the creation of Hitters and Pitchers respectively.
    Version:
    .1
    Author:
    Matthew Bunge
